at_bat.description: Kiké Hernández grounds out to third base, Luis Arraez to Willians Astudillo.
Alex Verdugo flies out to deep center field to Byron Buxton.
J.D. Martinez flies out to deep right center field to Jake Cave.
Byron Buxton doubles to left field.
Mitch Garver walks. Kyle Garlick to second. Byron Buxton to third.
Jorge Polanco out on a sacrifice fly to deep center field to Kiké Hernández. Kyle Garlick to third. Byron Buxton scores.
Miguel Sanó walks. Mitch Garver to second.
